ksef.description: KSeF API Configuration. Environment: 'test', 'demo', or 'prod'. Get token from KSeF portal. Token can also be provided via KSEF_TOKEN env var or Docker secret.

notifications.description: Multi-channel notification system. Enable one or more channels by listing them in 'channels' array. Secrets can be provided via config, environment variables, or Docker secrets.

pushover.description: Pushover mobile notifications. Get credentials from https://pushover.net/. Secrets: PUSHOVER_USER_KEY, PUSHOVER_API_TOKEN

discord.description: Discord webhook notifications. Create webhook in Discord channel settings. Secret: DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL

slack.description: Slack Incoming Webhook. Create in Slack App settings. Secret: SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL

email.description: Email notifications via SMTP. For Gmail use App Password. Secret: EMAIL_PASSWORD

webhook.description: Generic webhook notifications. Sends JSON payload to any HTTP endpoint. Secret: WEBHOOK_TOKEN (for Authorization header)

monitoring.description: Monitoring settings. subject_types: Subject1 (sprzeda≈ºowe - you are seller), Subject2 (zakupowe - you are buyer). date_type: Issue | Invoicing | PermanentStorage. timezone: IANA timezone name (default: Europe/Warsaw). logging_level: DEBUG | INFO | WARNING | ERROR | CRITICAL (default: INFO). See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones for valid timezone values.

prometheus.description: Prometheus metrics endpoint. Exposes /metrics on specified port. Metrics: ksef_last_check_timestamp (last API check), ksef_new_invoices_total (new invoices by subject_type), ksef_monitor_up (health status)
